name: Progress Indicators
description: Progress indicators provide information regarding the progress of a deterministic or nondeterministic process.

children.name: Spinner
children.description: A Spinner is a nondeterministic loading indicator.

children.name: Loading Dots
children.description: Loading dots are a nondeterministic loading indicator.

children.name: Progress Bar
children.description: Progress bars can represent nondeterministic and deterministic processes.
